Entry.en-US: The link(TRAIT_CLERGY_ZOROASTRIAN), link(TRAIT_CLERGY_JEWISH), link(TRAIT_CLERGY_CHRISTIAN) and link(TRAIT_CLERGY_MANICHAEAN) traits mark out characters as link(CONCEPT_CLERGY) of their respective link(CONCEPT_RELIGION).
Entry.it-IT: I tratti link(TRAIT_CLERGY_ZOROASTRIAN), link(TRAIT_CLERGY_JEWISH), link(TRAIT_CLERGY_CHRISTIAN) e link(TRAIT_CLERGY_MANICHAEAN) contraddistinguono i caratteri come link(CONCEPT_CLERGY) dei rispettivi link(CONCEPT_RELIGION).

Entry.en-US: A member of the link(CONCEPT_CLERGY) can remove link(CONCEPT_RELIGIOUS_DISSENT) from a city with the link(MISSION_QUELL_DISSENT_ZOROASTRIANISM) Mission.
Entry.it-IT: Un membro del link(CONCEPT_CLERGY) può rimuovere il link(CONCEPT_RELIGIOUS_DISSENT) da una città con la missione link(MISSION_QUELL_DISSENT_ZOROASTRIANISM). Missione.

Entry.en-US: A link(CONCEPT_GOVERNOR) can remove link(CONCEPT_RELIGIOUS_DISSENT) from their city with the link(PROJECT_SUPPRESS_DISSENT_ZOROASTRIANISM) Mission.
Entry.it-IT: Un link(CONCEPT_GOVERNOR) può rimuovere link(CONCEPT_RELIGIOUS_DISSENT) dalla propria città con la link(PROJECT_SUPPRESS_DISSENT_ZOROASTRIANISM) Missione.

Entry.en-US: Characters can be given link(CONCEPT_CLERGY) traits by the Head of your link(CONCEPT_STATE_RELIGION)'s link(MISSION_MAKE_CLERGY) Mission.
Entry.it-IT: I personaggi possono ricevere tratti link(CONCEPT_CLERGY) dal Capo della link(CONCEPT_STATE_RELIGION) della link(MISSION_MAKE_CLERGY) missione. Missione.
